        public Position nextPosition(int dC,
                    int dR)
        Method returns position from desk using relative coordinates.
        Parameters:
        dC - Relative coord. of column.
        dR - Relative coord. of row.
        Returns:
        Position on given coords. or null if wrong coords. were given.

        Method puts new figure on this position, respecting transformation from Man to King.

        Returns:
